page.title: 15CROPWELL YOUNG FARMERS
page.content: {Cropwell Young Farmer's Club}has a membership of approximately 50, who come from a wide area & many walks of life. They meet weekly at the Village Hall in winter & arrange visits in the summer. They take part in inter-club activities such as sporting competit- ions & quizzes, the Country Rally and Newark Show. In 1985 they won the club exhibit at the Newark Show. Annually they arrange a camping weekend & also an exchange with another club from further afield. Events are held for their own funds & an annual sponsored event for charity. This year a tractor was pulled from Cropwell Bishop to Cropwell Butler & back and raised over Â£340 for the Notts. Scanner appeal. At Christmas they go carol singing, & out of their own funds deliver a bag of potatoes to each pensioner's household - an event enjoyed by everyone.
